title: [Control Systems] Moxa security advisory (AV26-013)
description: On January 9, 2026, Moxa published a security advisory to address a critical vulnerability in the following products:
products: EDS-G4000 Series  firmware version v4.1 and prior
RKS-G4000 Series  firmware version v5.0 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
